name: Nyar'zathul, the Crawling Dream
ability: This unit is a nexus token. If you choose to remove this unit using your Incomprehensible Form ability, produce and assign 1 hit to 1 of your opponent's ships.

name: The Recurring
ability: When this unit is destroyed, you may spend 1 influence to place it on another planet in a system that contains 1 of your nexus tokens or your flagship.

name: The Fractal
ability: When this unit is destroyed, place fighters in its system up to its capacity.

name: Refractum
ability: During ground combat, before assigning hits; you may choose to assign 1 of those hits to 1 of your fighters in the active system instead.

name: The Pyre
ability: For each infantry destroyed by this unit's BOMBARDMENT ability, commit 1 infantry from your reinforcements to that planet.

name: Balefire Sentinel
ability: When this unit is destroyed, place it on this card. At the start of your next turn place each unit on this card on planets you control in your home system.

name: Ashfall Engine I
ability: When this unit is destroyed, you may use its BOMBARDMENT ability against a planet in its system.

name: Ashfall Engine II
ability:
This unit may not be destroyed by "Direct Hit" action cards.

When this unit is destroyed or uses its SUSTAIN DAMAGE ability, you may use its BOMBARDMENT ability against a planet in its system.

name: Cinderborn I
ability: When this unit is destroyed, roll 1 die. If the result is 9 or greater, you may produce 1 hit. Then, place it on this card. At the start of your next turn, place each unit that is on this card on a planet you control in your home system.

name: Cinderborn II
ability: When this unit is destroyed, roll 1 die. If the result is 6 or greater, you may produce 1 hit. Then, place it on this card. At the start of your next turn, place each unit that is on this card on a planet you control in your home system.

name: Iron Dominion
ability: Your mechs in this system gain Anti-Fighter Barrage 7.

name: Riptide I
ability: When this unit is destroyed, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on its planet. If it was in the space area, place 1 fighter instead.

name: Riptide II
ability: When this unit is destroyed, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on its planet. If it was in the space area, place 1 fighter instead. This unit may move without being transported. mechs in excess of capacity count against your fleet limit.

name: Worldshaper
ability: Any 1 planet of your choice that you control in this unit's system gain +1 resource and +1 influence. Any 1 planet of oyur choice in this unit's system that is controlled by another player has -1 resource and -1 influence.

name: Valuator
ability: DEPLOY: When you attach a Design to a planet, you may spend 1 resource to place a mech on that planet.

name: E.M.P
ability: Apply an additional -1 to ability rolls made by compromised PDS in this system. Compromised space docks in this system gain +1 to their PRODUCTION value.

name: Legion
ability: DEPLOY: When you place a structure, you may pay 1 resource to place a mech with that structure.

name: Siphon I
ability: When using this unit's PRODUCTION ability, discount the combined cost of the units produced by the number of compromised space docks on the game board. Up to 3 fighters in this system do not count against capacity.

name: Siphon II
ability: When using this unit's PRODUCTION ability, discount the combined cost of the units produced by the number of compromised structures on the game board. Up to 3 fighters in this system do not count against capacity.
